name: Epic.Sentinel_Mace_Mastery
display_help: Black Scorpion has granted you access to the advanced technology of the Executioner's Mace. The signature weapon of the Bane Spider Executioner, it is not a typical clumsy mace. The Executioner's Mace is capable of firing a variety of energy projectiles and grenades. It can even be modified to summon and command some or Black Scorpion's RV technologies.

powers.name: Epic.Sentinel_Mace_Mastery.Web_Envelope
powers.display_help: The Executioner's Mace can lob a modified Web Grenade. Upon impact, the Web Grenade expels a strong, tenuous, and very sticky substance that can Immobilize most targets in a wide area. This non-lethal device deals no damage and does not prevent targets from attacking, although their attack rate is Slowed. The Web can bring down flying entities and halts jumping. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: AoE â€” 15 ft. radius (10 targets max)

display_info: -20.00% strength to recharge for 15s on target
-20.00% run speed, fly speed for 15s on target

powers.name: Epic.Sentinel_Mace_Mastery.Pulverize
powers.display_help: You are capable of Pulverizing a foe with your Nullifier Mace dealing high damage, causing toxic damage over time. Pulverize will occasionally disorient foes as well. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Foe Disorient

display_info: 5 ticks of 5.28 toxic damage over 4.1s on target
20.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 5.96s on target
20.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 2s on target

powers.name: Epic.Sentinel_Mace_Mastery.Web_Cocoon
powers.display_help: The Bane Mace can fire a more powerful version the common web grenade. The sinewy fibers of this grenade are strong enough to completely Hold one target. Targets able to resist the Hold are still likely to have their attack and movement speed dramatically slowed. Web Cocoon can also bring down flying targets and prevent foes from jumping. You must be level 41 and have one other Mace Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Epic.Sentinel_Mace_Mastery.Focused_Accuracy
powers.display_help: When this power is activated, the Villain and allies focus their senses to dramatically improve their accuracy. Additionally, Focused Accuracy increase the team's Perception, allowing to better see stealthy foes. It also grants resistance to powers that DeBuff Accuracy. Focused Accuracy is a toggle power and must be activated and deactivated manually. Like all toggle powers, while active, Focused Accuracy drains Endurance while active. You must be level 41 and have one other Mace Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Team +To Hit, +ACC, +Perception, Res(DeBuff To Hit)

display_info.Effect Area: AoE â€” 25 ft. radius (16 targets max)

powers.name: Epic.Sentinel_Mace_Mastery.Summon_Tarantula
powers.display_help: Black Scorpion has granted you an Toxic Tarantula for you to command. Weaver One developed the Tarantula Exoskeleton Armor, which so radically transforms an Arachnos troop that hardly anything human is recognizable. Your access to this Tarantula is very limited. You can only summon it once every 15 minutes and it will leave after 4 minutes, or if you exit a zone or mission. You must be level 44 and have two other Mace Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Recharge: Extremely Long
